Html:
Hi,
I got this unhandled exception when I double-clicked on the "red" boxes.

See the end of this message for details on invoking
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.

************** Exception Text **************
System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException: The given key was not present in the dictionary.
   at System.ThrowHelper.ThrowKeyNotFoundException()
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.get_Item(TKey key)
   at InternalsViewer.Internals.PageIO.DatabaseHeaderReader.LoadHeader(IDictionary`2 headerData, Header header)
   at InternalsViewer.Internals.PageIO.DatabasePageReader.LoadHeader()
   at InternalsViewer.Internals.PageIO.DatabasePageReader.Load()
   at InternalsViewer.Internals.Pages.Page.LoadPage(Boolean suppressLoad)
   at InternalsViewer.Internals.Pages.Page..ctor(String connectionString, String database, PageAddress pageAddress)
   at InternalsViewer.UI.PageViewerWindow.LoadPage(String connectionString, PageAddress pageAddress)
   at InternalsViewer.UI.PageViewerWindow.AllocationViewer_PageClicked(Object sender, PageEventArgs e)
   at InternalsViewer.UI.AllocationViewer.OnPageClicked(Object sender, PageEventArgs e)
   at InternalsViewer.UI.Allocations.AllocationMap.AllocationMapPanel_MouseClick(Object sender, MouseEventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseClick(MouseEventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.WmMouseUp(Message& m, MouseButtons button, Int32 clicks)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(Message& m)
   at System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.WndProc(Message& m)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlNativeWindow.OnMessage(Message& m)
   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlNativeWindow.WndProc(Message& m)
   at System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Callback(IntPtr hWnd, Int32 msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam)
